name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access and executed malicious scripts on multiple hosts, leading to data compromise.

action--b7d3a891-b689-4e45-bd33-cc456c0e.name: Kill malicious process
action--b7d3a891-b689-4e45-bd33-cc456c0e.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

action--ce4e89be-2a36-4b81-94bb-1881148c.name: Isolate affected hosts
action--ce4e89be-2a36-4b81-94bb-1881148c.description: Block inbound traffic from the attacker's IP address.

parallel--cdddb1ff-c9e7-4f31-b1ef-0dd6cd.name: Handle Follow-up Mitigations
parallel--cdddb1ff-c9e7-4f31-b1ef-0dd6cd.description: Run follow-up mitigations parallelly: integrity check and notification.

action--a12b4c5d-e93e-4f8b-a2e5-8b0034cb.name: Run integrity check on affected files
action--a12b4c5d-e93e-4f8b-a2e5-8b0034cb.description: Perform integrity checks on potentially affected files.

if-condition--8abcaa03-9b0e-4be5-9e9c-ff.name: Check if suspicious files are found

loop--70053743-f4e3-4013-9743-8ec5c21535.name: Verify remaining files
loop--70053743-f4e3-4013-9743-8ec5c21535.description: Repeat integrity check until all files are verified.

action--dd5c85f4-2e51-4e7f-9cba-007a7288.name: Notify security team
action--dd5c85f4-2e51-4e7f-9cba-007a7288.description: Send notification to the security team regarding the incident.

action--abe7949c-b18d-4edf-9e0f-6bc0bae0.name: Update network firewall rules
action--abe7949c-b18d-4edf-9e0f-6bc0bae0.description: Implement firewall rules to prevent further access from the attacker.
